arts.ttl: Umbro Brasil Athletico Paranaense, Chapecoense, Fluminense, Gremio, Santos and Sport Recife 2024 Third Kits Released
arts.sum: Umbro Brasil a few days ago released new third kits for its Brazilian clubs - Athletico Paranaense, Chapecoense, Fluminense, Gremio, Santos and Sport Recife - that celebrate the brand's centenary.
